mapper.insert: insert into bs_bbs.tb_user(username, password, stu_number,phone_number,email_count) values (#{username},#{password},#{stuNumber},#{phoneNumber},#{emailCount});
mapper.select: select id, username, head_portrait, status, stu_number from bs_bbs.tb_user order by id desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize};
select id, username, sex, head_portrait, status, description, stu_number, fans_num, follow_user_num, email_count from tb_user where id=#{id};
mapper.update: update bs_bbs.tb_user set status=1 where id=#{id};
update bs_bbs.tb_user set status=0 where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_user_user where follow_user_id=#{id};
select count(*) from bs_bbs.tb_user_user where user_id=#{id};
mapper.delete: delete from bs_bbs.tb_user_user where user_id=#{userId} and follow_user_id=#{id};
mapper.select: select count(*) from bs_bbs.tb_user where username like concat('%' #{username} '%');
